content.description:
Climb to the right of the big hole after the first bolt. Clip the fourth bolt that is shared with the climb to the right,

Sugar

, and then head left and up.
content.location:
This shares a start with

Shooter McGavin

and ascends the black streak in the center of the wall.

content.description: Sugar is the easiest but my least favorite climb on the wall, because small holds kept popping on me at the second bolt even after cleaning. After clipping the final bolt on this climb, head straight up to the jugs, and make one traverse move to the left to clip the anchors.
content.location: The climb is on the right of the crag.

content.description: Shooter McGavin ascends the best rock on the wall. Some small holds, a balancy section, and a cool undercling move make this route one of the best at the crag.
content.location: It climbs straight up the middle black streak.

content.description:
This steep climb inspired the crag. Too bad it didn't turn out to be as good as I had hoped. This is my personal favorite route, but you have to hate yourself a little to like this climb. Start up

Pokemon Gym

, and head left at the third bolt. Journey across a poop ledge, and make your way up to the nipple. Find the good, hidden pocket to make the clip out right, and then head straight up utilizing some sandy holds before returning to some more solid rock shortly after.
content.location: It is the leftmost climb at the crag. Look for the largest roof.

content.description: Work your way up the gym-like mid-section to find something not gym-like shortly after. It would be better with better rock, but this climb is good.
content.location:
It shares a start with

Sandman

, the leftmost climb at the crag.
